name: hasura-event-detector-observability-dashboard
description: React dashboard for monitoring Hasura Event Detector observability data with real-time visualization and correlation tracking

scripts.serve: node -e "const http=require('http'); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const url=require('url'); const server=http.createServer((req,res)=>{res.setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Origin','*'); res.setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Methods','GET,POST,PUT,DELETE,OPTIONS'); res.setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Headers','Content-Type,Authorization'); if(req.method==='OPTIONS') return res.end(); const parsedUrl=url.parse(req.url); let filePath=parsedUrl.pathname==='/'?'simple-dashboard-cors-fix.html':parsedUrl.pathname.slice(1); if(filePath.includes('?')) filePath=filePath.split('?')[0]; const fullPath=path.join(__dirname,filePath); if(fs.existsSync(fullPath)&&fs.statSync(fullPath).isFile()) {const ext=path.extname(fullPath); const contentType={'.html':'text/html','.css':'text/css','.js':'text/javascript','.json':'application/json'}[ext]||'text/plain'; res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':contentType}); fs.createReadStream(fullPath).pipe(res);} else {res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not found: '+filePath);}}); server.listen(8900,()=>console.log('Dashboard server running at http://localhost:8900'));"

author: Hasura Event Detector Contributors
